PHRASE.LANG: Looks good enough to eat! But tell them not to - they'll break their teeth and it won't taste nice! [#Legal]
On pourrait le manger ! Mais prévenez vos amis avant qu'ils ne se cassent les dents dessus ! [#Legal]
Sieht zum Anbeißen aus! Doch das sollten deine Freunde nicht tun - sie würden sich die Zähne ausbeißen und es schmeckt auch nicht! [#Legal]
Sembra delizioso da mangiare! Ma digli di non farlo! Si spezzerebbero i denti e non avrebbe un buon sapore. [#Legal]
Aunque dan ganas de comérselos, ¡diles que no lo hagan! ¡Saben mal y podrían dejarse los dientes! [#Legal]
먹고 싶을 만큼 진짜 같네요! 하지만 먹지 말라고 하세요 - 이빨이 망가지고 아무 맛도 없을테니까요! [#Legal]
Looks good enough to eat! But tell them not to - they'll break their teeth and it won't taste nice! [#Legal]
看起來就好吃！但是可別讓小孩吃了，要不然又硬又難吃。 [#Legal]
看起來就好吃！但是可別讓小孩吃了，要不然又硬又難吃。 [#Legal]
Looks good enough to eat! But tell them not to - they'll break their teeth and it won't taste nice! [#Legal]
